table.name: vtiger_rsnstatisticsfields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnstatisticsfields` ( `rsnstatisticsfieldsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `fieldname` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fieldtype` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `uniquecode` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `statisticparameters` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rsnsqlqueriesid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnstatisticsfieldsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rsnstatisticsfieldscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnstatisticsfieldscf` ( `rsnstatisticsfieldsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnstatisticsfieldsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
